attributes.action: change the classification of the ambulance services in the uk (scotland, England and Wales) to an EMERGENCY services instead of essential services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Th Ambulance services in the uk are classified as essential services and as such do not get the same funding and rights as the police and fire brigade, such as when attacked by the general public or funding from local government to improve services to the community. If this was changed to classify us as Emergency service workers then the ambulance services across the UK would dramatically improve.
